_sText:
=======

This map's MAIN SELLING POINT:  NO AWP.  We're tired of AWPers on iceworld.

If you have an account and appreciate this map, please approve it!

Also, I would like to add, we DID NOT DECOMPILE fy_iceworld_cssource to make this map.  We took dimensional measurements and built it from scratch, using fy_iceworld_cssource as a reference.  That's explained below.

=======
CREDITS:
=======
Thanks to Valve Software for making Steam, Half-Life, Counter Strike, Half-Life 2, Counter Strike Source, and the Hammer Editor

Thanks to RD for the original fy_iceworld for CS, available at http://www.fpsbanana.com/?section=viewitem.maps.maps.main.1719

Thanks to Mr.Stealth for fy_iceworld_cssource, on which this map is based in CSS, available at http://www.fpsbanana.com/?section=viewitem.maps.maps.main.3694.

This map is based ENTIRELY on fy_iceworld_cssource, which would not have been possible if not for everything above.  Thanks everyone.  Great job.

Finally, thanks to the entire 301net Team for all your hard work.
=======
NOTES:
=======
Reworked version of a retracted release.  Based on fy_iceworld_cssource.  Removed AWP, added dual-elites, removed lamps, made middle dividers translucent, changed ground texture, changed water texture, changed ice texture, changed bombsite letter, changed lighting.
Basically, we worked from fy_iceworld_cssource and made the changes that we wanted and about which we've seen discussed on our host.

The screenshots are from a previous version.  Textures not viewed in normal game-play are, appropriately, removed.
